revision.text:
* quicklinks ** mainpage|mainpage-description ** portal-url|portal ** recentchanges-url|recentchanges ** Script|Script
* browse data **Special:BrowseData/Scene|Scenes **Special:BrowseData/Shot|Shots **Special:BrowseData/Character|Characters **Special:BrowseData/Environment|Environments **Special:BrowseData/Prop|Props
* SEARCH * TOOLBOX
Community Portal

[[Special:AddPage/News|Post a public News]]
=Community Announcements=
{{#ask:[[Category:Announcement]]| ?Date=| sort=Date| order=desc| format=ul| limit=5 }}
[[Special:AddPage/Announcement|Post a Community Announcement]]
=Recent Activity= {{Special:Recentchanges/5}}
=Let's do it=
Start by writing a [[Script]] and add some [[:Category:ConceptArt|Concept arts]]
Browse the entire data of this project : [[Special:BrowseData]].
[[Special:AddPage/Scene| Add a scene]] - [[Special:AddPage/Shot| Add a shot]] -[[Special:AddPage/Character| Add a character]] - [[Special:AddPage/Environment| Add an Environment]] - [[Special:AddPage/Prop| Add a Prop]]
Watch the Snapshots
Outils : [[Special:Allpages]]
__NOTOC__ __NOEDITSECTION__

revision.comment: New page: Uses the form [[Has default form::Form:News]]. Here is a list of latest news :
revision.text:
Uses the form [[Has default form::Form:News]].
Here is a list of latest news :

<noinclude> This is the 'News' template.
Edit this page to see the source code. </noinclude><includeonly> Posted on [[Date::{{{newsdate}}}]]
{{{newstext}}}
tags: {{#arraymap:{{{newstags|}}}|,|xxx|[[NewsTag::xxx]]}}
__NOTOC__
[[Category:News]]
</includeonly>

= Prop Information =
'''Model Status:''' [[model status::{{{model_status}}}]]

[[Category:Prop]]

Uses the form [[Has default form::Form:Character]]. This category can be browsed using the [[Has filter::Filter:Armature status]], [[Has filter::Filter:Material status]] or [[Has filter::Filter:Model status]].
List of Characters :

[[Has default form::Form:ConceptArt]] Add a concept art :
{{#forminput:ConceptArt|35||Add Concept Art|}}
List of Concept arts :

Uses the form [[Has default form::Form:Environment]]. This category can be browsed using the [[Has filter::Filter:Material status]] or [[Has filter::Filter:Model status]].
List of Environments :

Uses the form [[Has default form::Form:Prop]]. This category can be browsed using the [[Has filter::Filter:Armature status]], [[Has filter::Filter:Material status]] or [[Has filter::Filter:Model status]].
List of Props :

[[Has default form::Form:Scene]]
List of Scenes :

[[Has default form::Form:Shot]] Add a new shot :
{{#forminput:Shot|35||Add Shot|}}
List of Shots :
[[Has Type::Number]]

'''Animation Status''' is an [[has type::Type:Enumeration|enumeration]]. Valid values:
* [[allows value:=Nothing|Nothing]] * [[allows value:=Pose to pose|Pose to pose]] * [[allows value:=Completed|Completed]]

'''Rig Status''' is an [[has type::Type:Enumeration|enumeration]]. Valid values:
* [[allows value:=Nothing|Nothing]] * [[allows value:=In progress|In progress]] * [[allows value:=Completed|Completed]]
